review.title: “Not A place to work or gain experience”
review.pros: Pros – fresher can learn from volatile environment, plenty of job oppurtunities available through out the year, multitasking activity available
review.cons: Cons – paid after 2months for one month, no transparency in work, no proper communication from CEO, Director a part of gossip instead of work goal
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Kindly be fair to the team, and dont make them fight over there petty personal issue , and make it big. you pay for the work they are appointed for , not for you personal work of laying your plate for breakfast or cleaning your table, or carrying your laptop bag to the car
